patthana15.75:1.1: Saraṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.75:2.1: Araṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.75:3.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:4.1: Saraṇaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.75:5.1: Araṇaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
